players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night, and Diana has to be one of the villagers. We can't trust Charlie."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso, and I killed Bob last night. Alice's accusation is correct."
Diana: "Bob was the mafioso, and he killed himself last night."
